EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Americas_GDT_Buy-More_Pre-Black-Friday-Sale.GDT Pre-Black Friday Sale
EmailTemplate.subject: The Offers You’ve Been Waiting For
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Black Friday is just around the corner but at GoDirect™ Trade <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/K0000QI00qk92OG000JZ0X0]]>, our blowout sale is starting NOW! We’re excited to promote a PRE-BLACK FRIDAY SALE that will give our customers an additional 50% OFF already-discounted sales prices on select parts on 737NG, 747, 757, 767 and A320 Classic platforms.
Online only. Use code BLACK at checkout. Promo code expires on December 30, 2020. SHOP THE PRE-BLACK FRIDAY SALE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/PRE-BLACK_FRIDAY_SALE.xlsx]]> Best regards,
Lisa Butters Honeywell Aerospace GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]>
